figure
Interface Figure

All Known Implementing Classes:
Circle, FigureGraphic, Polygon, Rectangle, Triangle
public interface Figure

An interface implemented by other figures. By implementing this interface figures can be used for various operations like drawing, drag&drop, selecting, etc.

Method Summary
